messages.name: Flarp3000
messages.content:
Hey beautiful beings ✨🧚‍♀️
I am renting my beautiful cozy room with a balcony from 12 of December till 30 of January, preferably to Flinta 🌸 in my flat in Neukolln near the canal and Weserstr with many beautiful cafe places in the area. It is very cozy, has 20 square meters, has furniture the couch becomes a bed and there’s also a mattress below it, has good acoustics is especially good for artists or therapists, most of the music equipment won’t be there ✨✨
You would be living with another lovely person 😸 
The room cost is 550€ per month, I ask for a deposit of 300€, and it’s not allowed to smoke inside
Send me a message if you’re interested 🌼✨✨

messages.name: MandyBGT
messages.content:
Hi Loves 🌸

To make this post understandable for everyone, I will write it in English, but I also speak German :)
I am subletting my beautiful single room flat for 3 months (Jan - March), as I will be travelling during that time!!
The full rent is 600 Euro and it’s 39 m2, I can give you a breakdown when we meet.

The flat is a Neubau, very well isolated and it comes also with a balcony, basement, big windows, a bathtub , floor heating and some instruments (piano, electric guitar).
I also have many plants, so it would be great if you could take good care of them while I am gone :)
You also have heaps of supermarkets just around the corner.
Please also check if the address works for you (Niederschönhausen, Pankow)  before you write me a message. Its a bit more far out, but super chill and quiet. And with public transport you can reach everything quite well. It takes me 40 minutes to get to Alexanderplatz and only 30 minutes to Prenzlauer Berg.

messages.name: MandyBGT
messages.content:
You will have everything you'll need, its fully furnished.
The deal is, please just write me a message where you introduce yourself a bit, like what you do, what your hobbies are, why you are looking for a flat, if the time frame of 3 months works for you and then basically we just find a date when you can come by and take a look at the flat :))

I will actually already leave on the 22nd of December, so if you want to move in earlier you can. I wont charge extra for it :)

Looking forward to meet you and talk to you soon!

Hugs,
Amanda

messages.name: DominikSJ
messages.content: Where would you guys recommend to find a freelance media buyer / creative strategist (meta & tiktok) for our e-health startup?

messages.name: manuelallgaier
messages.content:
If it qualifies as "effective" (in EA terms) then this EA org can maybe help: https://www.goodimpressionsmedia.com/
If they have spare capacity they might also advise non-EA orgs, just ask.

messages.name: mesaoptimizer0
messages.content: What benefit would you get by an autism diagnosis though? There's no autism medication afaik

messages.name: locally_cartesian
messages.content:
- disability / disadvantage compensation
- you can still get therapy as support (e.g. ergotherapy to help improve some problems if you need), and likely paid (partially or full) by the social welfare office
- potentially "Schwerbehindertenausweis" (disability pass?) – autism generally gets you 30% (or much more), if you have some other problems you can get beyond 50%; even without, e.g. at just 20% or so, it means tax reductions
- lots of things you might be able to apply for – Eingliederungshilfe, persönliches Budget, Hilfsmittel, …
etc.

messages.name: mesaoptimizer0
messages.content: Thank you very much. If you have a detailed document or a list of links to know more about this, please PM me

messages.name: locally_cartesian
messages.content: I'm also flying by the seat of my pants and figuring things out as I go… ^^' I only know of adxs.org for ADHD, not of similar resources for autism yet… and similar problem as above… stuff is too complicated to figure out on my own, so I don't get support yet… ^^'

messages.name: mesaoptimizer0
messages.content: I hope you succeed!

messages.name: anosleepbel
messages.content: Yes 🫠

messages.name: anosleepbel
messages.content: Thanks so much for the answers!! 🙏🏼😊 Trying these options and if nothings fast enough gonna throw money at it (feels like it’s compensating if I can work better through it)

conversations.chat_name: Urban Joy Berlin 🎊🎉 conscious & bliss events with Joe & friends

messages.name: joejung
messages.content:
Life is an inspiring wonderland!?! ✨☃️🌋⛩🎁🌞🌃🌬🎡🚀🌛❄ When the necessary things of the day are taken care of it is time to dive deep & fly high!

In an amazing Bali-esque penthouse venue in Stadtmitte we explore in various natural ways how to enter trancelike, soothing, nourishing states of being & perceiving. Come to unfold your human potential in a group of kind and caring (new) friends.

✨️ 16.12. | 18:00-22:00 | Psychedelic Spa 🐣🧖🏻‍♂️🧖🏽🧖🏻‍♀️💆🏽‍♂️💆🏼‍♀️ + Sauna -  Natural psychedelic practices for rejuvenation, (self)connection & the beauty of life 🌍 www.urbanjoy.de/spa

Including beginners class 🐈🐈‍⬛🐈& Profirunden-Special 🐰🐇🐿
Über den Dächern von Stadtmitte 🌇

• SoloTicket 35-40€ 
• Duo/TrioTicket 30-35&
• Bring comfy clothes, 3+ Towels for Sauna, Lounge & Showers
• 1-2 reduzierte Helfertickets nach Verfügbarkeit
• Limitierte Plätze
• bring a tasty vegan snack or dish

Registrierung via 📲 PM an @JoeJung

More Community News
https://t.me/+RbIHh7o-EZXFFAPI

messages.name: Channel Post
messages.content:
Lovely Community, I invite you to another magical sound experience 💭✨💆🏼‍♀️ 

Wednesday 04.12. ✨ 18:30-19:30 

Imagine lying down, eyes closed, as waves of pure sound wash over you, creating an auditory journey. 
This is the essence of a sound bath. ✨

The frequencies of our Cristal Bowls not only help you to deeply relax and activating your selfhealing power, they also:

🪽harmonise your nervous system 
🪽release stress & tension 
🪽balance your emotional state

You return to your day completely REFRESHED, relaxed, blessed by the dreamlike states of a RELAXED NERVOUS SYSTEM & your touched inner world in just 1 hour. 

Join the next magical journey & reserve your spot now 
🫧  Wednesday 04.12.
18:30-19:30

💫Deluxe Ticket 22€ (Comfort included)
💫 Basic Ticket 15€ (bring yoga mat)

📍Unity Dome Berlin
Charlottenstr. 63

💌 Pm to join @JoeJung 🤍

messages.name: joejung
messages.content:
• 4.12. | 20:30-22:00 ☆ 
Lucid Breathing with Christian Rippel in a gorgeous Stadtmitte  Penthouse 🌬💨🌆 75 minutes of conscious breath

Experiencing the Power of Breath to move into the deeper layers of our Mind & Consciousness and tapping into our true Potential.

✨Lucid Breathing is a Breath journey with a selection of ancient & modern breathing techniques 

Remove physical & energetical blockages and experience deeper layers of of our life force.

🌟 The rhythm and ondulation of  breathing can give us access to  states of intense presence & clarity, while also leading into transformative experiences. 

Breath has been used for thousands of years by various  traditions to support health, foster longevity and as a path to  enlightenment. 

at Unity Dome Berlin 🕌
Charlottenstr. 63
10117 Berlin

Bring a Yogamat & blanket 🧘🏼‍♀

🎟 Abendkasse SoloTicket 23€ Duo/TrioTicket 20Eur

PM to RSVP @JoeJung
